summary: Adds a room for the thane to use in each jarlhouse
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][img=center]https://snag.gy/yjoaC0.jpg[/img][size=5]

Usable Thane Rooms In Each Of The Jarl Houses In The 9 Holds Of Skyrim[/size][/u][/b]


[font=Verdana]         [/font][color=#ff0000][size=5][u][b]Read this first[/b][/u][/size][/color]
[font=Verdana][color=#ffff00][size=3]Hey I do 3D work ([url=https://www.instagram.com/renderbydavid/]MyWork[/url]) and also know how to use unreal and unity, thinking about adding asset sets to skyrim but I wanted to learn how to use the creation kit first so I decided to add player rooms in each hold, don't expect it to be perfect as I still am learning how to make mods for skyrim. 

 [/size][/color][color=#ffff00][u]At the moment each room is available to the player right away at no cost, but I will make it to where you have to complete each thane quest to attain the rooms.(I don't want to mess up any quests for your game....yet haa)[/u]




[/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/3566/?][color=#00ff00][u][b][size=5][center]Download SkyrimSE version here[/center][/size][/b][/u][/color][/url]





[/font][font=Verdana][size=3][u]
[/u][/size][/font][color=#a61c00]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[color=#00ffff][size=5][u][b]Thane rooms in[/b][/u][/size][/color]
[list]
[*][size=6]Whiterun[/size]
[*][size=6]Riften[/size]
[*][size=6]Solitude[/size]
[*][size=6]Markarth[/size]
[*][size=6]Windhelm[/size]
[*][size=6]Falkreath[/size]
[*][size=6]Dawnstar[/size]
[*][size=6]Winterhold[/size]
[*][size=6]Morthal[/size]
[/list][color=#1e84cc]______________________________________________________
[/color][size=6][color=#00ff00][u]Compatibility[/u][/color]
[/size][size=3]This mod should work with any mod that doesn't alter the interiors of the jarl houses.[/size]


[size=5]Current issues as of Version 1.8[/size]
[list]
[*][size=3][color=#ff0000]Issues are mainly with weapon racks, you shouldnt lose anything if placed on them, [/color][u][color=#ffff00]please post if you lost anything on the racks or any issues you found thanks[/color][/u][/size]
[*][size=3][/size]
[*][size=3]Swords placed on shield rack in Whiterun  are way too high off[/size]
[*][size=3][/size]
[*][size=3]some weapons get placed upsidedown on racks[/size]
[/list][size=3]
Fixed Mannequins moving
[/size][list]
[*][size=3][/size]
[/list][size=3]

[/size]


[color=#ffff00]
[u][size=5]Plans for future versions[/size][/u][/color][size=3]
[/size][list=1]
[*][size=3]The thane room in markarth isn't really appealing to me it may change in future versions[/size]

[*][size=3]Make doors locked and add keys to jarls inventory to give to you when becoming thane[/size]
[*][size=3]Add more decor to each room matching lore to each hold[/size]
[/list][size=3]
[/size]
[size=5][b][color=#00ff00]How to install
[/color][/b]Manually : Just extract the .esp and place it in your data folder



If you update make sure to back up your save and get your items from the rooms, best to be safe


[/size]
[color=#00ff00][size=5][u]How to get to each room[/u][/size][/color]

[size=5][u]Whiterun[/u] [/size]: [size=4]Just behind the jarl[/size]

[size=3][img=center]https://snag.gy/57Rtxy.jpg[/img][/size]

[size=5][u]Riften[/u] [/size]: [size=4]To the right of the entrance

[/size][img=center]https://snag.gy/0gamlD.jpg[/img]

[size=5][u]Solitude[/u] :[/size][size=4] Go up the stairway and turn right into the hallway[/size]

[size=2][img=center]https://snag.gy/JvMUnd.jpg[/img][/size]

[size=5][u]Markarth[/u] :[/size][size=4] Right of entrance go past the wizard(the guy you see upon entering for the 1st time)

[/size][img=center]https://snag.gy/BjW2q9.jpg[/img]

[size=5][u]Windhelm[/u] :[/size] [size=4]Right of ulfric

[/size][img=center]https://snag.gy/Gpoq8x.jpg[/img]

[size=5][u]Falkreath[/u] :[/size] [size=4]You will see the ladder right when you enter, this is for all minor holds since they are the same(except for the rooms them self)

[/size][img=center]https://snag.gy/vfcVXU.jpg[/img][size=3]

[i]
[/i][u][size=3][i]This doesn't matter  only a preference : [/i] ///[/size][/u][size=3]Keep in mind these are just rooms not whole houses so they are not very big, I tried to keep it balanced through each hold, Higher holds=bigger room minor=lesser ect. They are not meant to be a players only house, I didn't want to take away the feeling of thinking these rooms are enough to live in. [/size][/size]
author: renderblender
